text: 6.17 Lom 11.29, Hib 11.9 Bɨlel God ne binɨb okok kɨlop dɨtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgayn agɨl, kɨlop takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl ak agek kɨli nɨgɨlak, chɨnop dɨtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab. Pen kɨli takaw anɨb ak nɨgtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgel agɨl, ne anɨb agak, Takaw yad apin ak ma kelɨgɨnɨgayn, gos olap kɨdek ma nɨgɨnɨgayn agak. Kɨles tɨmel yɨbɨl agɨl agebin, Yad gɨnɨgayn agebin tek gɨnɨm agebin agak.
